CustomField.description: The number of internal calls that were established from one user to another within the organisation from the perspective of the From party, and where the From party became a transferree, i.e. the call was transferred to them. Specifically this statistic only includes the transferred calls, and does not include any initial calls that the user may have made.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: How many calls did I take part in to other internal users in my organisation as a logical From party, but where the call had been transferred to me
CustomField.label: Internal From Calls as Transferree
